forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sun and clouds mixed. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds. Low 32F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 13C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 58F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. Low -1C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. Low 31F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 11C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 54F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy. Snow likely after midnight. Low 1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Snow likely after midnight. Low 36F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning transitioning to light rain late. High 8C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain late. High 49F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the evening turning to all snow late. Low 1C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 12-20cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the evening turning to all snow late. Low 36F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precip 100%. Snow accumulating 5 to 8 inches.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain and snow. High 6C. Winds SW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with rain and snow in the morning changing to all rain in the afternoon. High near 45F. Winds SW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%. About one inch of snow expected.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers before midnight. Becoming partly cloudy later. Low -4C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow showers early. Breaks in the overcast later. Low 28F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High near 10C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 0C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 33F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. Morning high of 11C with temps falling to 3 to 5. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy with some showers in the afternoon. Morning high of 54F with temps falling to near 40. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy with snow showers during the evening. Low around 0C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 60%. Snow accumulating 3-7cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow showers in the evening. Then becoming mostly cloudy late. Low 34F. Winds light and variable. Chance of precip 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 56F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers later at night. Low 38F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 56F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with partial clearing expected late. Low 3C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies early will become partly cloudy later at night. Low near 40F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 61F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low around 5C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the evening with more clouds for later at night. Low 44F. Winds NE at 5 to 10 mph.
